channel.description:
DragonCraft HardCore PVP Factions Dragoncraft is a fun, friendly, HardCore PVP Faction server. We have friendly staff that will help you in the most ways as posibble. We have a lot of mini games and warps for you to enjoy. Subscribe To Our YouTube Channel @ http://www.youtube.com/user/DragonCraft290
